root.name: Swing Away Golf
root.description: OverviewSwing Away Golf is a golf game developed by TE Soft and published by Electronic Arts for the PlayStation 2 platform, which borrows several concepts from Sony's Hot Shots Golf franchise. You can build your own course, as well as play in normal mode or "story" mode where you distributw Skill Points for Distance, Accuracy, Control and Recovery and move up in ranks towards a professional career.
